Class Dispatcher 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----Dispatcher
public class Dispatcher
extends Object
implements Runnable
Keeps a list of all clients, and dispatches messages to them all

see Object Diagram for RmiChatServer application

Version:
1.0 Oct 1997
Author:
Alex Chaffee (alex@stinky.com)

messages

Dispatcher(MessageQueue)

add(MessageReceiver)
add a client to the list
dispatch(Message)
send a message to all the clients
remove(int)
remove a client from the list
remove(MessageReceiver)
remove a client from the list
run()
wait for the queue to be full, then send its messages

messages 
 protected MessageQueue messages

Dispatcher 
 public Dispatcher(MessageQueue messages)

add 
 public int add(MessageReceiver receiver)
add a client to the list

remove 
 public void remove(MessageReceiver receiver)
remove a client from the list

remove 
 public void remove(int id)
remove a client from the list

dispatch 
 public void dispatch(Message msg)
send a message to all the clients

run 
 public void run()
wait for the queue to be full, then send its messages
